MNK I dont think many investors have read it this suit hence all the speculation Its obvious CMS broke their contractual obligation with MNK so this suit should be an easy win for them Even in the unlikely event that MNK looses this suit Acthar sales will only be affected by 10 Management has projected CAGR in the mid to high single digits which will absorb any loses in Acthar within a few years Im sorry but I think the market has grossly mispriced this one I cant think of a single stocks whos projected EPS is near their share price And before you start screaming debt level a 42x net debtEBITDA ratio is easy to manage with their FCF Teva and Bausch Health have much higher leverage ratios and they are doing just fine As a contrarian investor I feel right at home here
